page.title: 03SPACE TO PLAY:AUSTIN FARM
page.content: {1}I don't mind where I live but what I don't like is that you can't play with a ball just about everywhere you go. The other thing is there are not enough play parks. {2}Sometimes I get bored because there is nowhere to go like sports centres and the cinema.But sometimes I don't mind being in Eggbuckland like when I have got my friends to play with. {3}I have very strong feelings about play facilities in our area.There are hardly any parks.There is one field with a sewer running straight through it.Fields are growing houses.Parks are vandalised by punks.In Deer Park there are 'No Ball Games' signs everywhere. Once there used to be a lovely valley but they have turned it into a silly, noisy,dirty road. Why? There are enough roads already.
